attributes.action: In recognition of the sacrifices of the World War 2 Generation they should be exempt from all income and council tax. This generation has given enough to the rest of us
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The wartime generation, ie those born before the end of 1929 (For example) should now be exempted from all income and council tax for the rest of their lives. This is not an aged based tax that would continue into the future but a one of recognition of the sacrifices made by the military and civillian population of the UK during the War.
To mark 70 years since the start of World war 2 it would cost this nation a small amount but would mark the end of their tax burden, they need do no more for their nation.
